Agony.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Rend Soul now applies a 1.5s stun to the victim when they are afflicted with 4 Soul Charges.

Bane.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Every Soul Charge you detonate reduces the Cooldown of Restore Soul by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Blood Pact.card_desc: [Restore Soul] While channeling Restore Soul you heal yourself for {scale=70|70} Health per second.

Dark Sight.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Activating Rend Soul restores {scale=2|2} ammunition

Dark Whisper.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Increase your movement speed in Shadow Travel by {scale=20|20}%

Dusk Walker.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Reduce the Cooldown of Shadow Travel by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Essence Rip.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Rend Soul heals you for {scale=8|8}% more.

Fade to Black.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Activating Restore Soul reduces the Cooldown of Shadow Travel by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Mortal Reach.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Increase the range of Restore Soul by 300% and the Duration by 1s.

Nether Siphon.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health every second while in Shadow Travel.

Soul Collector.card_desc: [Weapon] Each Soul Charge you detonate increases your Base Health and Weapon Damage by 2% until you die. Stacks up to 15 times.

Soul Forge.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Restore Soul by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Spirit Leech.card_desc: [Restore Soul] Every Second channeling Restore Soul generates {scale=2|2} ammo.

Umbral Gait.card_desc: [Weapon] If an enemy is affected with a Soul Charge you move {scale=8|8}% faster

Veil.card_desc: [Shadow Travel] Reduce the cast time of Shadow Travel by {scale=15|15}%

Wickedness.card_desc: [Rend Soul] Reduce the Cooldown of Rend Soul by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.
